disabled_step_creation: New steps cannot be added in Batch Edit mode.

step_description.moveLabware: Move labware to and from deck slot and module locations.
step_description.moveLiquid: Move liquid to and from wells/tubes.
step_description.magnet: Engage or disengage the Magnetic module.
step_description.temperature: Set temperature command for Temperature module.
step_description.thermocycler: Change Thermocycler state or program a profile.
step_description.heaterShaker: Set heat, shake, or labware latch commands for the Heater-Shaker module

defaults.aspirate_airGap_checkbox: Aspirate air before moving to next well
defaults.dispense_airGap_checkbox: Aspirate air before moving to Trash to dispose of tip. Tip will be disposed of at the end of steps using this setting.
defaults.aspirate_flowRate: The speed at which the pipette aspirates
defaults.dispense_flowRate: The speed at which the pipette dispenses
defaults.aspirate_mix_checkbox: Pipette up and down before aspirating
defaults.dispense_mix_checkbox: Pipette up and down after dispensing
defaults.aspirate_delay_checkbox: Delay pipette movement after each aspirate in this step, including any Air Gap
defaults.dispense_delay_checkbox: Delay pipette movement after each dispense in this step
defaults.blowout_checkbox: Where to dispose of remaining volume in tip
defaults.blowout_location: Where to dispose of remaining volume in tip
defaults.disposalVolume_checkbox: Aspirate extra volume that is disposed of after a multi-dispense is complete. We recommend a disposal volume of at least the pipette's minimum.
defaults.changeTip: Choose when the robot picks up fresh tips
defaults.preWetTip: Pre-wet pipette tip by aspirating and dispensing 2/3 of the tip's max volume
defaults.aspirate_mmFromBottom: Distance from the bottom of the well
defaults.dispense_mmFromBottom: Distance from the bottom of the well
defaults.aspirate_touchTip_mmFromBottom: Distance from the bottom of the well
defaults.dispense_touchTip_mmFromBottom: Distance from the bottom of the well
defaults.aspirate_delay_mmFromBottom: Distance from the bottom of the well
defaults.dispense_delay_mmFromBottom: Distance from the bottom of the well
defaults.mix_mmFromBottom: Distance from the bottom of the well
defaults.mix_touchTip_mmFromBottom: Distance from the bottom of the well
defaults.aspirate_touchTip_checkbox: Touch tip to each side of well after aspirating
defaults.dispense_touchTip_checkbox: Touch tip to each side of well after dispensing
defaults.mix_touchTip_checkbox: Touch tip to each side of the well after mixing
defaults.volume: Volume to dispense in each well
defaults.heaterShakerSetTimer: Once this counter has elapsed, the module will deactivate the heater and shaker

indeterminate.aspirate_airGap_checkbox: Not all selected steps are using this setting
indeterminate.dispense_airGap_checkbox: Not all selected steps are using this setting
indeterminate.aspirate_mix_checkbox: Not all selected steps are using this setting
indeterminate.dispense_mix_checkbox: Not all selected steps are using this setting
indeterminate.aspirate_delay_checkbox: Not all selected steps are using this setting
indeterminate.dispense_delay_checkbox: Not all selected steps are using this setting
indeterminate.preWetTip: Not all selected steps are using this setting
indeterminate.aspirate_touchTip_checkbox: Not all selected steps are using this setting
indeterminate.dispense_touchTip_checkbox: Not all selected steps are using this setting
indeterminate.mix_touchTip_checkbox: Not all selected steps are using this setting
indeterminate.blowout_checkbox: Not all selected steps are using this setting

disabled.pipette-different: Cannot edit unless selected steps share the same pipette.
disabled.labware-different: Cannot edit unless selected steps share the same type of labware.
disabled.aspirate-labware-different: Cannot edit unless selected steps share the same type of source labware.
disabled.dispense-labware-different: Cannot edit unless selected steps share the same type of destination labware.
disabled.multi-aspirate-present: Cannot edit while one or more selected steps uses the multi-aspirate path.
disabled.multi-aspirate-present-pipette-different: Cannot edit while one or more selected steps uses the multi-aspirate path. Selected steps must also share the same pipette.
disabled.multi-dispense-present: Cannot edit while one or more selected steps uses the multi-dispense path.
disabled.multi-dispense-present-pipette-different: Cannot edit while one or more selected steps uses the multi-dispense path. Selected steps must also share the same pipette.

disabled.wait_until_temp: There is no temperature module on the deck

disabled.latchOpen: Labware Latch cannot be open while the module is shaking

touchTip.disabled: Touch tip is not supported with this labware

edit_module_card.magnetic_module_collision: When magnetic module is in Slot 1, GEN1 8-Channel pipette cannot access Slot 4.
edit_module_card.temperature_module_collision: When temperature module is in Slot 3, GEN1 8-Channel pipette cannot access Slot 6.

edit_module_modal.slot_selection: To enable non-default/unrestricted positioning, go to Settings > App > Experimental settings.

profile.add_cycle: Add a series of steps that cycle
profile.add_step_to_cycle: Add a step to the cycle

save_batch_edit.enabled: Apply changes to all selected steps

cancel_batch_edit: Reset unsaved changes to the form
